entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023
